Actions.Name: Perform a batch operation
Actions.Description: Completes an operation on a number of WooCommerce items

Actions.Name: Create a new item of the specified type
Actions.Description: Creates an item using specified parameters

Actions.Name: When a WooCommerce event happens
Actions.Description: Select events across Coupons, Customers, Orders, Order Notes, Products, Subscriptions and more

Actions.Name: Delete an item of the specified type
Actions.Description: Deletes an item of the specified type and id

Actions.Name: Find a list of the selected item type
Actions.Description: Gets a list of items of the selected type from the store

Actions.Name: Get a single item of the selected type
Actions.Description: Fetchs an item of the selected type from the store

Actions.Name: Update an item of the specified type
Actions.Description: Updates an item using specified parameters
